title: 1 week later, the 4 inters have not been banned, support tickets are useless.
body:
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/mgz7A6JH-4-inting-people-checking-their-match-history-once-again-proved-something-to-me this was the post i made almost 7 days ago. where i said i will write a ticket about 4 people clearly running it down.

https://puu.sh/E0GIg/b523999f19.jpg here a small reminder so that noone can say "just a bad game". less than 1 cs per minute, almost as much deaths as minutes and mobi boots to int even quicker. (one of them even has more deaths than minutes played)

since so many people started saying "write a ticket to riot support" i thought i give it a try. my experience with riots support is from season 3-5 where i send in over 50 tickets and nothing was ever done.
so i thought i try it again and give them a fair chance. and with the perfect exaple, 4 inting people.

https://puu.sh/E0GGN/e0f78c0be6.png here a screenshot of the ticket. while being nice, riot person only said the typical stuff. 

i checked on all 4. 3 of them played recently, one of them played his last game 4 days ago. on the 31.7.2019

you can deny it all you want, noone can deny the truth. unless you are among 0,00001% of manual reviews, nothing will happen to you even if you run it straight down.
and support tickets are as useless as they always were. 

case closed. noone ever gave any proof of support tickets doing shit, but here we got ONCE AGAIN proof of them doing absolutely nothing. stop wasting your time with writing the riot support.

replies.body: Feelsbad for that Triforce Ravenous hydra player, looks like they were actually trying to win that despite everyone else.
the fiora (was a fiora) was really relaxed. didnt say anything and did her thing. IF I COULD JUST HONOR ENEMYS!
Post removed for naming and shaming in 3...2...
there are no names of the inters here.

Support tickets for reports are the same as in-game reports. And those work. 

They may not of been banned but they may have had a punishment.

You never know, they said it doesn't always tell you a punishment has been issued out.

Trust me, I've reported a ton of people.

I know it works.

Usually.

if you get a CR for straight up inting, then youre a first timer.
the ticket system does not work
I've tried it once and it worked. It's the same as in-game, though, and those work.

proof or didnt happen.
and again, noone NOONE ever got a CR for inting. it always got forwarded to a 2 week ban.

I'm sorry but life isn't, "If I don't see it, it didn't happen". 

By that logic everything in the past didn't happen. These shootings in America aren't happening. Nothing besides what you see is happening.
Which, therefore, I'm not existing when you can't see me, which isn't true.

cant proof it but also not accepting the existing proof.
our talk is over sir, keep existing in your fantasy world

I should be the one saying that to you. 

You can't proof the several messages and stuff you got when someone gets banned or chat restricted or anything from a long time ago. 

This... _proof_ isn't proof for everything. Just because 1 time they weren't banned didn't mean that it never bans anyone. 

The bot isn't perfect. It only gets people occasionally, not 100% of the time, not 0% of the time.

So "keep existing in your fantasy world" where everything is about you and you are always right just because you think you are.

And enjoy the report :)
Inting always has an escalated penalty- either a two week ban or possibly a permaban. You don't get chat restricted for inting, especially if it was manually reviewed after a support ticket.

Please explain to me why the fuck someone would receive a chat restriction for inting.

Yea I’m gonna run it down mid and as my punishment I will not be able to use chat. Your logic makes zero sense

Pretty sure you replied to the wrong person.

I said nothing about chat restrictions for inting.

You said “they may have not been banned but they may have had a punishment”

Please tell me what other punishment riot hands out for people inting

I meant to watch that game but never got around to it.

Hopefully something's done about those 3 players. I don't really agree that the Alistar was intentionally feeding, but it seems like the other 3 players, who were a premade, were likely doing so. I can't speak for support in this case, but they do take these matters seriously. The times where I've submitted tickets on players who were intentionally feeding, I felt like their behavior was appropriately looked into.

all i can say is from the chat behavior of all 4, they were clearly having fun. they kept feeding lux and kept saying "omfg youre so good lux, go to lec youre awesome" even alistar did it. which really confuses me honestly.

Thats what i have told them many trillion times but i am always wrong... Dude tickets arent effective.... Start playing aram like me.. Riot has given trollers way too many chances and nothing is done... Ranked are only good as flex 5 friends...

So they haven't played for four days....  and you're certain they haven't gotten banned?

Maybe they're just all out of town together, eh? Four random players all ceasing to play for four days at least... Nope, they're not banned at all.

i said 3 of them played yesterday, besides one guy who played his last game 4 days ago.

also they were premades

You didn't say yesterday, you said "recently".

Even still, you have no way of knowing if your report has been reviewed yet.

they ticket got answered and closed
and my actual post game report is almost 7 days old.

Yes, that means they put your report into the queue.

You do not jump the queue with a support ticket.

If you want the backlog to be decreased you should be advocating for less players to falsely report such behaviors clogging the report queue.

****
You know, I just noticed something. If their entire team agreed to open mid to let the game end sooner, they may not be punished for doing so. Given their ridiculously low gold and fact so many were involved, this seems likely.

> [{quoted}](name=rujitra,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=F4kqKEIm,comment-id=00070000000000000000,timestamp=2019-08-03T13:42:25.259+0000)
>
> Yes, that means they put your report into the queue.
> 
> You do not jump the queue with a support ticket.
> 
> If you want the backlog to be decreased you should be advocating for less players to falsely report such behaviors clogging the report queue.
> 
> ****
> You know, I just noticed something. If their entire team agreed to open mid to let the game end sooner, they may not be punished for doing so. Given their ridiculously low gold and fact so many were involved, this seems likely.

So u wont ban based on a theory that has 10% likelihood most? Nice.. Also what he meant is that if they got banned it would be a 14 day.... So if they played within 5 days means no ban was accumulated .... Simple.... ANd riot isnt god... You dont have to stand up for them like yr life depends on it....

**I** have no power or responsibility in regards to this. I am just another player.

I am trying to provide the facts and the fact is that them playing yesterday does not mean Riot refuses to ban them. There are other explanations.

> [{quoted}](name=rujitra,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=F4kqKEIm,comment-id=0007000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2019-08-03T16:47:01.396+0000)
>
> **I** have no power or responsibility in regards to this. I am just another player.
> 
> I am trying to provide the facts and the fact is that them playing yesterday does not mean Riot refuses to ban them. There are other explanations.

How can i become a specialist too?
You would need to ask the boards volunteers on the Discuss the Boards board. One of them approached me with a reply asking if I wanted to, I'm not sure if that's still how they're selecting or what.

> [{quoted}](name=rujitra,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=F4kqKEIm,comment-id=0007000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2019-08-03T16:47:01.396+0000)
>
> **I** have no power or responsibility in regards to this. I am just another player.
> 
> I am trying to provide the facts and the fact is that them playing yesterday does not mean Riot refuses to ban them. There are other explanations.

Then care to explain how Rito allowed a troll and their premade to go on a month+ long blatant trolling spree without getting banned. Do they need a month to decide whether a /joke spamming support Zed with 6 Doran shields is considered trolling?
But ... who did you report? It's not like you specified it in your ticket.
i mention 4 inters... and 4 of 5 enemys have a score around 0/15... yeah hm which one did i surrender? i bet the 8/4 guy.
Don't assume or imply anything in communication. The more specific you are with your communication,  the better the results you'll see.

You know, if you really believed the crap you're peddling, there's a pretty simple way for you to prove it.  Go to a game, INT, and post a screenshot here.  If what you're claiming is true, nothing will happen, right?

if you'd just read my post and check the attached match history, you could see for yourself. but sure thing np, i'll go on my smurf (with my luck im part of the 0,00001% to get manual reviewed) run it down in an ai game so to not ruin anything for anyone and ask for reports constantly.

and after thats done i'll edit this comment and add the screenshots.

AND THEN i wanna see the excuse you bring when "the crap im peddling" is a hard fact.
because im alrdy laughing when i imagine the shit you'll come up with.


edit: https://puu.sh/E1Fo5/af15927352.jpg
https://puu.sh/E1FpS/876577865e.jpg
https://puu.sh/E1FrG/d8c4812cda.jpg

mods will most likely delete this as im basically saying "hey look im rule breaking and nothing happens" so read it fast. im waiting for the excuse you have now.

> [{quoted}](name=Jennifer420,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=F4kqKEIm,comment-id=000e0000,timestamp=2019-08-05T20:10:51.350+0000)
>
> if you'd just read my post and check the attached match history, you could see for yourself. but sure thing np, i'll go on my smurf (with my luck im part of the 0,00001% to get manual reviewed) run it down in an ai game so to not ruin anything for anyone and ask for reports constantly.
> 
> and after thats done i'll edit this comment and add the screenshots.
> 
> AND THEN i wanna see the excuse you bring when "the crap im peddling" is a hard fact.
> because im alrdy laughing when i imagine the shit you'll come up with.
> 
> 
> edit: https://puu.sh/E1Fo5/af15927352.jpg
> https://puu.sh/E1FpS/876577865e.jpg
> https://puu.sh/E1FrG/d8c4812cda.jpg
> 
> mods will most likely delete this as im basically saying "hey look im rule breaking and nothing happens" so read it fast. im waiting for the excuse you have now.

Don't be silly, run it down in a normal game with your main account.  Put your money where your mouth is.

so basically your excuse is
"if you dont int on your main, it doesnt count" cause riot automatically knows if someone is a smurf or a main?

well, your excuse is even worse than i thought lol. but i knew even with proof you still deny the reality. you realize this isnt lol reddit right? you gotta go to lol reddit to meet other yes man

I mean, he does have a point. If you really believe in your theory, you would have no problem doing it on your main account in a PvP game, aside from I suppose feeling guilty about ruining a game for strangers. But yeah, Riot needs to step it up with being more strict on inters/trolls. I definitely believe many get away with it. But does reporting or sending in a ticket really do nothing as you suggest? I dont know. I have enough doubt to not test it myself, and you must have a little doubt as well, since you wont test it yourself in a pvp game with anything at stake (your main account, not a throwaway smurf in a vs ai game).

> [{quoted}](name=Jennifer420,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=F4kqKEIm,comment-id=000e000000000000,timestamp=2019-08-05T21:27:56.220+0000)
>
> so basically your excuse is
> "if you dont int on your main, it doesnt count" cause riot automatically knows if someone is a smurf or a main?
> 
> well, your excuse is even worse than i thought lol. but i knew even with proof you still deny the reality. you realize this isnt lol reddit right? you gotta go to lol reddit to meet other yes man

My point is that you don't believe what you are selling here.  As evidence, instead of testing on an account that matters, your main, in a game where people will care - a PVP game, you instead tested it on an easily replaceable smurf account, in an AI game where your actions have literally near-0 effect on the outcome because a single person half-trying can win the game, and where it's very possible you're playing with a bunch of people who are so new to the game they don't even understand the value of reporting.
The reporting system is not a system to give you vengeance. It is a tool to _help_ promote better behavior.

And the Player Behavior Board always wonders why people say inters never get banned. Heh.

Support tickets have always been inconsistent.

or maybe...juuuuust maybe, support tickets are not a way to bypass the backlog?

and this is just one mans opinion but judging by your post history, you might want to spend less energy worrying about if people get punished, it's a waste of time, move the hell on ffs

the latest time i talked about someone going unpunished in my post history is over 8 months ago.
so i think im good to go with moving on, thanks.

maybe you should give your helpful advice about moving on to the 3 people that played 3v3 as they soon lose their map.

Aight you are the worst person I've ever seen outside of the actual game. 

You are so freaking toxic and apparently _love_ being that way so please don't post anything toxic in boards again or I will report you in both boards and League.
report me. maybe then you will stop bugging me.

It seriously isn't good to internalize this stuff. I don't know you, how old you are, what you do for a living, but you're going to encounter lots of assholes and people who make things difficult. You need to focus on yourself and not on these other people who cross your path for tiny moments of time. You had a video game match ruined. Everyone understands that sucks big time, because it's happened to all of us. Why choose to continue carrying that negative mojo around with you? Let the assholes be assholes and be glad you're not them.

Been playing for 19 days had a really bad game tonight trying to learn top lane. 0/15/1 as Trynd vs Mord who I never laned against. The entire team went negative, everyone lost their lane and i got 1 shot if I left base pretty much. Got instantly banned for 2 weeks after the game for feeding -_-

https://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/3137518078/2266917008189568?tab=overview

Yes I know I am bad, I was bad at jungle when I first started too but the only way to learn is to try it.. Really ridiculous system if you ask me.

I already said that and I got around -20 in my post. 
I put there a link to a guy that played nunu and each game he was having a 0/10 and it was like that  for 10+ if you would check out his match history and he is still playing. No response. I have submitted a support ticket... it's open up until now, no response. 

The report thingie is just a placebo, unless it's chat cuz an A.I. does the chat.
At the same time, no one ever claimed that sending a ticket would do anything. On the contrary, the advice was always "Use the end-of-game report feature."

hey welcome back to the boards, guess you've been gone for a few months. cause in every thread asking about getting trolls flamers etc banned its always "send in a support ticket, best thing you can do"

Jeniffer as i sayd we have to make our own database to know if the people who been disruptive against us been finded by riot for what they done , i got 10 months ago banned instantly after a game 4 people been toxic to me , 1 been grief/troll and i got instantly banned by ifs , even if the chat logs very missunderstooded , the support line assistance keep claim the fact i deserved the permanent ban , after 10 months i checked back to see if that trolling guy even got investigated cause i had no way to report him as the game took me out from it ... , without giving me the option to report it ... , clearly riot dosn't even understand what is toxic or not , they just acting from instinct , if 4 people report me , they will ban me .


I will make a test later on another account.


the reason i got punished is unknown as i don't get any explication after i been asking them " Whart lines from my chat logs been toxic considered"  , they just ignored me and i presume they clearly feel same as me that the ban isn't correctly apply , but because of the low level of negativity inside it  they claim it should stays... , is really intresting how they apply rules.
